div.div:
Josh - January 26, 2012 - HTC Nexus One with version 1.0.8
Works well. Mild upgrade from Gingerbread.
I tried the various free versions on the market as well, and this one really does work the best. The corrections work and are accurate - consistently. Gestures need some work, but I'm fairly happy.

Russ - January 16, 2012 - HTC Desire with version 1.0.8
Best keyboard for HTC desire
I've had no buggy problems. I think this is better than the swift key keyboard. Much easier to type, clearer layout and I like the extra symbols such as ™®©π√°| plus a tab key.

veronica - February 17, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Note with version 1.0.8
Good
Fast and good auto correction. I got the paid version because I wanted to download themes. Well bad news, non of the themes work, I get a black screen when I choose any theme I downloaded. I have downloaded like all available themes in the market still black screen. Samsung galaxy note

Timmay - June 4, 2012 - Version 1.0.8
Good but needs a little work
Like others have said the re-correction is a little buggy. If you tried to correct a word you've already typed the suggestions won't appear most of the time. also if you've used ICS before there is still a noticeable difference. This keyboard is the better (If not the best) one(s) I've used since I can't get used to swiftkey (i just can't like it even when I've tried)

leopheard - January 29, 2012 - Version 1.0.8
Nice smart keyboard
Great little app. Very quick and responsive. Has speeded up my Android a great deal. Has some great features like gesture swipes to close the keyboard quickly or delete the last word.

Erich - June 9, 2012 - HTC One X with version 1.0.8
Works fine!
However mic shortcut doesn't appear on the main keyboard. Error prompt: "Voice input is not currently supported for your language", please support English for ICS keyboard. Otherwise a better alternative to the stock keyboard.

Barbra - February 15, 2012 - Galaxy S2 Skyrocket with version 1.0.8
Worth the $
This is the best keyboard I've ever used. I just went from a qwerty keyboard to touch screen and the auto-correct was killing me. Don't be a cheapskate, donate for this app and you will get some nice extra features! I love that it supports gestures!

Joseph - February 9, 2012 - LG Optimus One with version 1.0.8
Very bad
This thing makes all of my text input wonky, reducing space. No! Update and I will consider long term relationship.

Rush - April 14, 2012 - HTC EVO 3D with version 1.0.8
Awesome keyboard... But doesn't work on forums.
Doesn't work on forums on my HTC 3D phone. Freezes a lot. I guess only HTC keyboards work with HTC sense. It's a pity though.

Jon - May 9, 2012 - HTC One X with version 1.0.8
Excellent keyboard
I don't normally do reviews unless I feel an app has helped. I have had the HTC One X for a month and the keyboard sucks on it, always pressing . every time, tried Swift Key which is good, but has small space bar too. I had ICS keyboard free on my S2, so tried it on my One X and I can finally text again with out hitting friggin . all the time! So paid for full keyboard. Will give 5 stars when UK keyboard gets fixed, I need £ not $

Ethan - January 13, 2012 - Droid Bionic with version 1.0.8
Awsome but buggy
Great keyboard, awsome reaction time, but very buggy. When brought up often stays blank with no keyboard and begins to lag everything out, forcing me to switch input methods. Bionic

Sharky - April 26, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.0.8
Amazing.
Perfect keyboard... I hate swype I dislike the stock keyboard, but this shi right here... this shi... its called deaf

ashleigh - March 25, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.0.8
So much better than stock SGS2 keyboard!
Well worth buying the paid version. Absolutely shames the stock keyboard on the SGS2. Well done dev!

Richard - April 24, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.0.8
Almost perfect
Beats the stock Samsung galaxy s2 keyboard hands down. Very accurate and fast. Looks very clean. Doesn't seem to error correct text boxes on web pages. I'm not sure how I feel about that though.

Carolyn - June 13, 2012 - HTC Sensation 4G with version 1.0.8
Brilliant keyboard app
Finally, a keyboard that works for me! I like that it doesn't have a stupid microphone or language button getting in the way of my typing. The spelling correction is intuitive and helpful and it wants me to double-click to confirm new word save so I don't accidentally save mistypes. Nice layout and themes, very happy. A+++++ would download again.

Chance - February 7, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.0.8
Best ICS keyboard out there
Best out of the 3 ICS keyboards I've tried. Has big keys that are adjustable.

Ehsan - February 23, 2012 - Galaxy S2 Skyrocket with version 1.0.8
Awesome
This keyboard is awesome. I wish it had height adjustment for landscape as well. If you guys could do that. It would be perfect. Other then that. The auto correct feature on this keyboard is the best I've experienced yet.

Jen - May 7, 2012 - HTC Incredible S with version 1.0.8
I also purchased this to adjust the keyboard height. It doesn't work & skins ...
I also purchased this to adjust the keyboard height. It doesn't work & skins are hit & miss. Kept it on good faith but the dev doesn't reply to emails

DvaL - March 18, 2012 - Samsung Droid Charge with version 1.0.8
Awesome
Outstanding word correction. I can type away without even looking up at my message until the end. Great job!

Omnifarious - March 27, 2012 - HTC G2 with version 1.0.8
It does what it's supposed to
But I can't really tell much of a difference between it and the old keyboard.

James - March 30, 2012 - Droid Bionic with version 1.0.8
Worth it
Nice keyboard but the themes aren't working in the paid version....that's the only reason I gave it 4 stars.....Droid bionic

Justin - June 1, 2012 - Version 1.0.8
Good keyboard
Best keyboard ever!!!! A must have

Ranblv - May 17, 2012 - HTC One X with version 1.0.8
Works great on HTC one x
Very accurate, all the functions of a great keyboard.

Daniel - February 3, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.0.8
Easy to use
Very easy to learn the interface and it runs great on my phone. Samsung Epic 4G

Dave - May 2, 2012 - Motorola Atrix with version 1.0.8
Does the job.
Works very well. Had an issue with the popup letters being cut of, showing half the letter, after changing the system font using Font Changer. I just wish there was a way to add a margin to the bottom of the keyboard. On the Atrix, I have issues typing in portrait mode. Otherwise, works well.

Abdulrahman - June 28, 2012 - HTC One X with version 1.0.8
Please add language switcher
I love this keyboard and I would give it 5 starts but I'm getting nervous whenever I tried to switch keyborad language. Please add switchercbutton or configure space button to switch the language (long press for example) !!

John - June 28, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S3 with version 1.0.8
Thank-you
I love this keyboard so much. I had it before I got my new s3. Samsungs default keyboard is terrible I hate the overintusive auto correct. This keyboard is the best on the market get the full version. I find that I don't press keys by accident. Worth the money.

fady - June 7, 2012 - HTC One S with version 1.0.8
Bought it for $2 and I cant use it ...what a wast . Can ...
Bought it for $2 and I cant use it ...what a wast . Can only use the standard keyboard

Eric - May 10, 2012 - Version 1.0.8
Its okay
I like it in portrait mode but in landscape its really small and there's no way to adjust this

Bruno - July 1, 2012 - Motorola Defy with version 1.0.8
Even better!
The free version is good but you get super extra features by donating, gesture to delete last word for example. Well worth supporting! Punyweakling's skins work well with this - most are free.

Jason - June 22, 2012 - Version 1.0.8
Never updated
Keyboard was great on release but has slowly become less and less useful due to the lack of updates. There are many bugs and simple features that could be added but the developers refuse to do so.

Kevin - June 5, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.0.8
Great keyboard
Love the auto correct way better than the Samsung one as it was really annoying and really off but would love to see a Korean support for the keyboard Also the height for keyboard on whatsapp is bugged cannot change the height when using the alphabets

Jindri - June 22, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.0.8
qwerty
I bought this app to get a QWERTY layout for the Czech keyboard, but this app doesn't have it :( I'm disappointed.

Justin - June 17, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S3 with version 1.0.8
What a lifesaver!
I'd been using a Galaxy Nexus for a while now and was really loving the new keyboard for ICS. Then picked up a Galaxy SIII and had a lot of troubles getting the Samsung keyboard to work well and was getting really frustrated with the poor auto correct. Happened to find this and now my Galaxy SIII is perfect! If no one told me this wasn't the stock ICS keyboard, I never would have known! Thanks for all the hard work to make this excellent keyboard replacement!

White Razor - June 10, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S3 with version 1.0.8
Great, but have suggestions and GS3 issues maybe
Thanks for making this! It has a nicer feel than the stock Samsung keyboard that comes with the new Galaxy S3. It feels easier to use and the options are pretty good. Just a few suggestions though: - Make the swiping a bit easier to use, maybe having an option to change the intensity of the swipe. Swiping in any direction actually creates more mishaps than working for me. I'd really like to be able to flick in the direction as opposed to having to swipe all the way across the keyboard. - Have an option to switch the comma button (left of spacebar) to an apostrophe. Apostrophe may be used more than comma so it'll be nice to have a dedicated button for it. We already have comma as long press of period so it feels we have two easy access points to comma. Problems: It's probably a new problem with this new phone, but the keyboard height doesn't work on the Galaxy S3... at least from what I can see. Oh and I think there may be issues with the voice input... doesn't appear to work, or the microphone button doesn't appear.

Tha - June 4, 2012 - Version 1.0.8
Great layout but buggy.
HTC Rezound rooted on ICS. about 30% of the time, the kb does not come up, only a black screen on its place. I normally have to close the app and re-open it in order for it to show up. Also, please make it default to letters rather than numbers when you launch it.

John - March 31, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.0.8
Missing voice input.
The voice input key isn't showing up on my SGSII running official ICS. Samsung doesn't like to include the default android keyboards, even thought theirs is terrible.

mike - February 9, 2012 - Motorola Droid X with version 1.0.8
Text box
Why does only bottom half of keyboard look like should? I have enabled got donated version reset phone nothing??? Any suggs

Nancy - June 9, 2012 - Version 1.0.8
Asterisk
The asterisk key does not work

Evelynn - June 13, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.0.8
Refund
Doesn't work at all...

cosmos - April 19, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.0.8
Awesome!
Any chance of an option to remove the settings button and choose something else (comma etc)?

Seth - January 13, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.0.8
Great!
Great Keyboard, worth the dough!

Kiran - April 2, 2012 - HTC Desire HD with version 1.0.8
Nice
Very nice ics keyboard however would be better if there were more customization options like adjusting the size and color of the alphabets, gab between the letters, etc.

Kevin - April 3, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.0.8
Great but..
Bought this for adjusting portrait height and that option is not working. Fix for 5 stars

Herbert - June 26, 2012 - HTC Shooter with version 1.0.8
Alekz
Its nice, it works pretty nice on my HTC evo 3D. 4 stars cause I dont like when it says 'donation' when I switch languages when I hold the space bar.

ReynCor - May 5, 2012 - Samsung Sidekick 4G with version 1.0.8
Bad dvorak
The rows are shifted by three keys length...Nice look though

George - February 16, 2012 - Motorola Atrix with version 1.0.8
The one to get.
Liked the free version, paid one enen better.

DeJuan - May 19, 2012 - HTC Evo 4G with version 1.0.8
HTC EVO 4G
I love this key bored. I've been using it for over 4 months now and finally divided to purchase the full paid version.

ZOMBIE - April 13, 2012 - Galaxy Prevail with version 1.0.8
Lol
Does not work on my galaxy prevail. Running CTmod 3.4 Kouma Kernel 2.4. Phone sees it but nothing works. No settings work or themes. I do like the free version tho.

BritBoi - April 8, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.0.8
LOVEZ
Purchased because I wanted to support the BEST keyboard on Google Play!

Wang - February 27, 2012 - HTC Evo 4G with version 1.0.8
5 stars for caps lock
I'll give this app 5 stars if in the next update caps lock is included, its an all around good app but it'd be a better one and a great keyboard if they put that in aswell

Daniel - March 15, 2012 - LG Optimus One with version 1.0.8
Themes
Great app but extra downloaded themes will not work. Other than that awesome.

Jarvin - May 28, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.0.8
Galaxy Nexus (GSM)
It forces when using gestures, please fix it for a better rating!

daniel - April 30, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.0.8
More features plsss
i kind of wish it supported keyboard height for landscape /:

Matt - May 26, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.0.8
Great keyboard but...
Sometimes suggestions stay highlighted and auto correction isn't very accurate (galaxy s2/epic 4g touch)

Rodrigo - June 21, 2012 - LG Optimus 2X with version 1.0.8
Bad.
Space punctuation doesn't work when auto correction is turned off. Even if the option for punctuation is checked.

Michael - January 25, 2012 - HTC Thunderbolt with version 1.0.8
I love the full version
I think the full version works better.

Josh Bear - January 30, 2012 - HTC EVO 3D with version 1.0.8
Simple and Smart
Finally a good keyboard with great settings!

Drawde40599 - March 27, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.0.8
Works great
But what's up with the orange in typing box? Looks like hell on ics rom

Sam - March 27, 2012 - HTC myTouch 4G Slide with version 1.0.8
Wow
This whole time I thought I had the donate version lol I've been using this keyboard for months now and love it. Sorry and thanks Dev, just purchased it tonight. Haven't used my QWERTY since :-)

trickinit - March 20, 2012 - Version 1.0.8
Works great!
Love the touch correction option!

faustino - May 18, 2012 - Version 1.0.8
Love it
Thank you guys for a good keyboard

Trey - March 30, 2012 - Version 1.0.8
Very
Nice, i was using free version and decided to donate, very good job with the keyboard.

Marvic - May 7, 2012 - SEMC Xperia Ray with version 1.0.8
Very good...
The best keyboard for android...

Emmanuel Galván M. - January 29, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Ace with version 1.0.8
Very good
Runs faster, is snappier and uses less memory than other ICS keyboards. Didn't work with GB theme but no problem with default / ICS theme. Gestures are great!

shannon - April 3, 2012 - Version 1.0.8
:-)
I like this keyboard better then my old grinder bread

Joseph Ananias - May 17, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Note with version 1.0.8
Very good
Very good, clean keyboard layout.. please add the function "period after pressing 2 space bars".

jeffrey - May 14, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.0.8
.galaxy s2
Real nice got the dark theme to go with it and looks sick .

marshanda - February 25, 2012 - HTC Evo 4G with version 1.0.8
The best keyboard out!!!!!....Need to be able to change the color the keyboard

Ronny - April 6, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Note with version 1.0.8
Nice
Awesome keyboard

Brandon - March 16, 2012 - Samsung Nexus S with version 1.0.8
Awesome
Stable and fast

Ryan - February 28, 2012 - Droid Bionic with version 1.0.8
Love it
Works great!!!!!

J - February 18, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.0.8
ICS
Just downloaded it and I'm loving it already.

Dark Shim - June 1, 2012 - HTC One S with version 1.0.8
Excellent keyboard!
This is my daily driver. Highly recommended. I've been using this keyboard for a long time and It's worth every cent.

Holyspirit180jg - February 8, 2012 - LG Optimus 2X with version 1.0.8
Update?
Please? Its been a month

iixxii - June 15, 2012 - Version 1.0.8
best keyboard on the market

Jay - June 5, 2012 - HTC One X with version 1.0.8
Only 2 problems
Sometimes the keyboard sounds go away or are just too loud. Also sometimes the keyboard letters stick or have a box around them.

Abdullah - May 24, 2012 - HTC One X with version 1.0.8
Best keyboard ever
Very nice and clear keyboard

stefano - March 7, 2012 - Version 1.0.8
Sgs2
La migliore!!

Willie - April 22, 2012 - Droid Bionic with version 1.0.8
Nice
Works good for me.

Sam - January 11, 2012 - Version 1.0.7
Problems
On Samsung Galaxy running Miui. When it switches from Portrait to Landscape or even if you nudge the phone while typing you get a black screen, and have to press the back key to get back to your app. Sometimes it will freeze up and you cant see what you are typing in the text box, although when you hit enter in chat for example, the text does get sent. Kinda annoying. Please fix.

Rob - January 10, 2012 - Samsung Nexus S with version 1.0.7
When I first purchased it I thought the price to be steep for what ...
When I first purchased it I thought the price to be steep for what it was... But then I used it! Great everything: automated correction; relevant suggestions; and to add to its perfect rating for the above, it also looks great and for those who may want something more "out of the box" - it supports themes. Support this developer with the donate version regardless of the feature set differences. 5+ rating.

François - January 11, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.0.7
Issue with QWERTZ layout
When using QWERTZ keyboard layout (French-Switzerland), I should get the numbers by a long touch on characters 'QWERTZUIOP' but it doesn't work for 'QWZ' (nothing is displayed or a wrong number). It seems to be confused with 'AZERTY' keyboard layout. Except this bug, it works fine.

joshua - January 6, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.0.7
eh.
its a good keyboard but when it switches from landscape to portrait mode most times it will just show a blank black screen, at which time you have to press the back key to get back to your text. kinda annoying.

WPWoodJr - January 11, 2012 - Droid Bionic with version 1.0.7
Love it!
The ICS keyboard is great, looks nice, and takes up less room on my droid bionic's screen than the stock motorola keyboard.

maceo - January 6, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.0.7
Oops
I found a problem... Keyboard is better then The gingerbread but it don't have the Arrow key Option. Please add that on so I could use it again.

Sultan - January 17, 2012 - SEMC Xperia Arc S with version 1.0.7
Language button is needed
I stoped using this apply because there is no language switch button.

ham - April 6, 2012 - Version 1.0.7
02x
woww love this keyboard

Kylee - December 11, 2011 - HTC Desire HD with version 1.0.6
Amazing!
I have had the Free Version sense it came out but finally upgraded to the Donation Version and I am loving it, I have completely uninstalled the HTC Input Keyboard, ICS Keyboard is very fast and stable for a Beta IMO. I just think the word "donation" should be removed from the Settings menu under "Language & Keyboards", that's the only negative thing I could find even though its not even a big deal at all.

Kevin - January 2, 2012 - Motorola Droid X with version 1.0.6
Very good, not perfect.
Occasionally doesn't capitalize the first word in a message and have had some issues with the caps button not staying on. Been jumping between this and SwiftKey, but the more I use this, the better I like it. Fix a couple minor issues and it would be perfect.

Eva - December 30, 2011 - HTC Incredible 2 with version 1.0.6
Best keyboard
I really love it. I tried go keyboard and every thing but this was the best. First thing I've bought. Much better than normal keyboard. I'd like the option to have arrows but other than that, perfect :-)

SUP3R - December 13, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.0.6
Great
Crashes sometimes but its all part of the road to perfection. Still the best keyboard I've used to date!

Rico - December 28, 2011 - Version 1.0.6
Good.
Good, not great but good.

Giovanni - December 11, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.0.6
Epic 4g Touch
Just the keyboard I was looking for!!! Works excellent and my keyboard skin looks great!!!

Lee - December 11, 2011 - HTC Thunderbolt with version 1.0.6
Love it!
Would love it more if we could add custom smilies though. ;]

Thomas - January 5, 2012 - Version 1.0.6
Good...
Good, but doesn't work right with many apps on Xperia PLAY.

mike - December 16, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.0.6
Great keyboard
Adjust key height is glitchy though. Doesn't quite work.

Conrad - January 5, 2012 - Motorola Atrix with version 1.0.6
Buggy
Good keyboard but buggy when it comes to this implementation of recorrection. Have yet to see an update fixing some of the problems. Not sure if it's worth donating.

Ryan - December 11, 2011 - Motorola Droid RAZR with version 1.0.6
Great keyboard.
I've used swipe it, swift key, and others. This is by far the best. Needs a little improving but I give a for effort and work done so far.

anthony - December 17, 2011 - Motorola Droid X with version 1.0.6
Problem?
I have to force close the app after changing anything within the settings for them to apply or even get the keyboard to work. Droid x

DJ Darkknight - December 17, 2011 - LG Optimus 2X with version 1.0.6
Love it!
Check out my DarkIce skins for this keyboard.. In the market...thank you!

Tori - January 7, 2012 - Version 1.0.6
Pretty nice...
Please add landscape mode height option.

Kay - December 24, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.0.6
Great keyboard
The keyboard is worth spending every single penny on

fadromata - December 12, 2011 - SEMC Xperia X10 with version 1.0.6
fadromata1
Nice. Keyboard worth the money.

Danny - December 15, 2011 - Version 1.0.6
Really good
Love this keyboard. Really good.

Rock - December 20, 2011 - HTC Droid Incredible with version 1.0.6
¿ Y U NO STAY DEFAULT
? wye

ICS - December 12, 2011 - HTC Desire S with version 1.0.6
Great application.

Ted - January 2, 2012 - Version 1.0.6
Great tapping kb.

Stephen - December 14, 2011 - Samsung Droid Charge with version 1.0.6
great work!

angel - December 10, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.0.5
awesome
Very good keyboard love it especially the voice device great job responds well keep up the good work need some cool skins to use with it

Dom - December 8, 2011 - Motorola Droid X2 with version 1.0.5
landscape options
Please add the ability to change the size in landscape as well. Once done ill give it 5 stars. As is landscape is a bit tiny.

Ryan - December 7, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.0.5
Great
Awesome all the way around.

Dmobile215 - May 4, 2012 - HTC Thunderbolt with version 1.0.5
Can't update keyboard
This application is a turn for the worst. I'm using HTC Thunderbolt Flashed to Cricket first time I got an error from an update

Tlaz - December 8, 2011 - HTC Incredible 2 with version 1.0.5
Bug report
I have a bug to report. The developer asked to send them by email but there's no contact information.

james - March 22, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.0.5
:(
Won't update

mbrando45 - December 7, 2011 - Version 1.0.5
AWESOME!!!
BEST ANDROID KEYBOARD HANDS DOWN!!! THANK YOU!!

Dan - December 3, 2011 - Version 1.0.4
As I commented in the free version:
DONATE TO THIS GUY. This is by far the best... I've used them all. Swype, Samsung Keypad, SwiftKey, you name it. They are all great (well maybe not so much the Samsung, haven't tried the new one since the 2.3.6 OTA update, but no reason to now) but this is by far the BEST.

Daniel - December 1, 2011 - Version 1.0.4
Sweet so far
I love this keyboard, just one thing editing key height does respond! And also can you make a theme to have the key highlights turn green?

Luc - December 3, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.0.4
Best keyboard period!!!!
I used to swear by the Swype keyboard until I tried this one out! Blew my mind! Bought donation version! Fastest most responsive and accurate! Thanks

Nathan - December 3, 2011 - Droid Bionic with version 1.0.4
Droid Bionic
Loving it! Works great! Only problem is height only works on 200. Every other height defaults back to 100. Would like one in between.

tbone - December 5, 2011 - Droid Bionic with version 1.0.4
I love it.
I got my themes. Thank u. Best keyboard around.

Hud - December 4, 2011 - HTC Incredible 2 with version 1.0.4
Good
Works very well! I love the skins!

Xaroc Drocass - December 3, 2011 - Version 1.0.4
Love it.
Started with the free version, loved it so much I grabbed the donate version. Great work, keep it up ;)

bluezr1 - December 5, 2011 - HTC Evo 4G with version 1.0.4
Nice..
Needs option to turn off period after double space.

Dösi - December 2, 2011 - Samsung Europa with version 1.0.4
Worth it!
Worth it! This project is definitely worth donating for :)

Raul - November 22, 2011 - Samsung Nexus S with version 1.0.3
Thanks for making this available!
Works perfectly on nexus s 4g.

BugZapper - November 22, 2011 - LG Optimus One with version 1.0.1
Magnificent.
Fabulous. Working on a $100 prepaid T-Mobile LG optimus T running Andriod 2.2.2. Works like an a dream! Bravo!!! Please port the ice sandwhich SMS!!

Israel - November 28, 2011 - Version 1.0.3
Best keyboard ever
It's the best Android keyboard I've used so far. That and the developer has been very helpful answering questions/looking into issues :-)

Sardonic - November 25, 2011 - HTC Thunderbolt with version 1.0.2
Very nice
Accurate, fast, and decent updates. I moved from NY favorite swype to this and use it daily. Closest accuracy to iPhone keyboard I gave found.

David - March 31, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2
Really nice keyboard
Ah, at last, a keyboard that doesn´t insert the last word typed ... I was getting so fed up with the stock Samsung keyboard and sending messages and emails with words which either looked stupid in context or just simply should not have been there! I type rather fast and sometimes the keyboard doesn´t quite catch up with me so maybe I am not adjusting settings somewhere? Are there specific settings for the speed of the keyboard; anyone know? Otherwise, I´m totally happy for the donation version ....

Scott - May 10, 2012 - Casio G'zOne Commando
Kind of blows for me
The whole reason I purchased this app was so I can use the voice prompt but could never get it to work with my Casio G zone commando. Of course I send an e-mail to figure out how to get this thing to work with my Casio but received no reply from the maker and of course too late to get a refund oh well don't recommend.

David - June 29, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S
Suckish
Just bought the full version and it is just the same as the other version. Won't let me refund!

Chris - June 23, 2012 - Samsung Nexus S
Enter button
Thank you for providing a keyboard that does not require a long press to move down a line. I donated

div.h4: Sucks nuts,the slidekeyboard is way too small and you can't make it bigger,thanks ...

div.p: Sucks nuts,the slidekeyboard is way too small and you can't make it bigger,thanks that i have smart pro keyboard has everything i need and more

div.div:
Lip Sheng - April 24, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2
Buggy
Dev pls fix the blank layout bug

div.p: Nice app. But 25mb memory usage it a little steep for a keyboard..

div.div:
Mique - June 11, 2012 - HTC Desire S
good, but lacks a few things...
Gestures could be better (more sensitive). More themes - like a "gingerbread version", or HTC version (green color instead of blue).

Salvador - April 23, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S
Not as fast as free version

Scott - May 10, 2012 - Casio G'zOne Commando
Kind of blows for me
The whole reason I purchased this app was so I can use the voice prompt but could never get it to work with my Casio G zone commando. Of course I send an e-mail to figure out how to get this thing to work with my Casio but received no reply from the maker and of course too late to get a refund oh well don't recommend.

David - June 29, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S
Suckish
Just bought the full version and it is just the same as the other version. Won't let me refund!

Chris - June 23, 2012 - Samsung Nexus S
Enter button
Thank you for providing a keyboard that does not require a long press to move down a line. I donated

div.h4: Sucks nuts,the slidekeyboard is way too small and you can't make it bigger,thanks ...
